name: Crazy Hot Cars
description:
The best addictive game!!
Welcome to Crazy Cars!!
Control both Crazy Cars at the same time.
Collect all the objects and avoid from the balls
A highly engaging, , fast and enjoy the game!

Welcome to the Craziest World of Crazy Cars. "Crazy Hot Cars" is sure to drive you crazy with the tough challenges and exciting levels. Driving one car is easy but imagine driving two cars at the same time. Handle two cars and avoid the obstacles that come along your way to score the maximum points. Slide left or right to change the lane. The game is going to be very challenging.

"Crazy Hot Cars" is designed with great graphics and awesome sound effects. The game is perfectly designed for players from all age groups kids to teens to adults. This is the most interesting and addictive game. Put on your gaming skills hat and dare to complete the level with the highest score. Enjoy the game and get a chance to win some great prizes. Achieve the top position of the leaderboard and be eligible to win exciting rewards cash or gifts. Along the race ensure to collect the boosters to help you complete the level faster and avoid the obstacles. Remember the obstacles can appear any time and suddenly. Be prepared and get ready for the most exciting game ever.

Download the game and be the champion of the racing world. Face the challenges and enjoy the unlimited fun controlling the two crazy cars. Control the crazy cars and earn the maximum points to be on the top of the leaderboard with high score. The game is equally exciting and challenging. Drive crazy and go crazy with adventurous ride!
